TopicTitle: How to change target in map view?

Articles.Content:
I feel like an idiot for asking, but how do you change your focus (target) in map view?

I keep hitting a mystery button which changes my target, and not knowing how to change it back, it's really messing up my missions. Especially when your rocket has a bug that makes it blow up when you exit to KSC and reload while in transit.

Edited September 7, 2012 by segaprophet
Tab It took me soo long to find that because I'd get annoyed when I accidentally targeted Kerbin and was trying to land on the mun lol ;D

Tab It took me soo long to find that because I'd get annoyed when I accidentally targeted Kerbin and was trying to land on the mun lol ;D

OMG thank you! You're a lifesaver, my research can continue!
amen, thank you dragon! Rep for you, sir!
